hero.title: FiddleBops
hero.description: A fun interactive music learning game

music.title: Fun Music Learning
music.description: Learn music rhythm through interactive gameplay, making music learning fun and easy

feedback.title: Instant Feedback
feedback.description: Get real-time feedback on your performance to help you master the right rhythm and techniques

difficulty.title: Progressive Learning
difficulty.description: Start with simple rhythms and gradually increase difficulty as you improve

convenience.title: Play Anywhere
convenience.description: No download required, start your musical journey right in your browser

objective.title: Game Objective
objective.description: FiddleBops is a musical rhythm game where you create your own beats by combining different sounds and instruments.
objective.point1: Create unique musical combinations by selecting different characters
objective.point2: Learn rhythm and timing through interactive gameplay
objective.point3: Express your creativity by mixing various sound elements

basic.title: Basic Controls
basic.point1: Click on characters to add their sounds to the mix
basic.point2: Click again to remove a sound from the mix
basic.point3: Use the play/pause button to control the music

advanced.title: Advanced Features
advanced.point1: Record your mix to save and share with others
advanced.point2: Combine up to 8 different sounds simultaneously
advanced.point3: Use the volume slider to adjust individual sound levels

scoring.title: Scoring System
scoring.rule1: Earn points for creating harmonious sound combinations
scoring.rule2: Get bonus points for maintaining rhythm and timing
scoring.rule3: Unlock new characters and sounds as you progress

compatibility.question: What devices can I play this game on?
compatibility.answer: FiddleBops is a browser-based game that runs on any modern browser, including computers, tablets, and phones. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge.

prerequisites.question: Do I need musical knowledge to play?
prerequisites.answer: Not at all! FiddleBops is designed for music beginners and helps you understand music rhythm through simple and fun gameplay. The game starts with basic rhythms and gradually increases difficulty as you progress.

tips.question: Any tips for playing the game?
tips.answer:
1. Start with simple rhythms
2. Listen to the beat and follow the rhythm
3. Experiment with different sound combinations
4. Use headphones for a better experience
5. Take your time and enjoy the music
